alert.note: Alert for Lee; Randolph; Terrell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Randolph, western Lee and Terrell Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 345 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Leesburg to near Shellman. Movement was north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dawson, Leesburg, Albany, Shellman, Sasser, Bronwood, Bridges Crossroad, Herod, Jordan Place, Yeomans, Clarks Mill, Dawson Municipal A/P, Byne Crossroads, Graves, Scrutchins, Armena, Oakville, Neyami, Chickasawhatchee and Doverel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
